description: Executor to build and deploy cloud functions

firebaseProjectProdId.description: The firebase project id of the production flavor

firebaseProjectDevId.description: The firebase project id of the development flavor

outputDirectory.description: The output directory of the build

tsConfig.description: The tsconfig file to use for the build

region.description: The default region to deploy the functions to

dryRun.description: Whether to run the command as a dry run

verbose.description: Whether to run the command with verbose logging

concurrency.description: The number of functions to deploy in parallel

devEnvFileName.description: The name of the environment file for the development flavor

prodEnvFileName.description: The name of the environment file for the production flavor

prod.description: Whether to deploy the production flavor

dev.description: Whether to deploy the development flavor

functionsDirectory.description: The directory containing the functions to deploy

only.description: Only deploy the given function names separated by comma

force.description: Force deploy all functions, even if no files changed

packageManager.description: The package manager to use for deploying with firebase-tools
